item.title: Universal Stochastic Equations of Monitored Quantum Dynamics
item.description:
Author(s): Zhenyu Xiao, Tomi Ohtsuki, and Kohei Kawabata

We investigate the monitored quantum dynamics of Gaussian mixed states and derive the universal Fokker-Planck equations that govern the stochastic time evolution of entire density-matrix spectra, obtaining their exact solutions. From these equations, we reveal an even-odd effect in purification dyna…


[Phys. Rev. Lett. 134, 140401] Published Mon Apr 07, 2025

item.title: Quantum Trails and Memory Effects in the Phase Space of Chaotic Quantum Systems
item.description:

Unstable periodic orbits are, however, a negligible part of the phase s…

item.description:
Author(s): G. Aad et al. (ATLAS Collaboration)

Top quarks and antiquarks have been detected in heavy-ion collisions at the Large Hadron Collider, showing that all six quark flavors were present in the Universe’s first moments.
